extendedInfo.description: ***** Notice *****Changed the default save locationVideo Path: .autoboy/.record -> autoboy/autoboy_videoPhoto Path: .autoboy/.capture -> autoboy/autoboy_photoPaid version of the Autoboy BlackBox is sold in the Google Market.You can search 'autoboy' in the Google Market.AutoBoy-BlackBoxBlack Boxes are a necessity these days. Have you hesitated to get a black box app for your phone because of the high prices?Now available at Android Market, you can get the Autoboy Black Box for free. From now on, Autoboy will be your personal guardian for free,with all the functionality that you can get from other paid applications. - Video Recording1) Background Recording2) Automatic Recording Saving3) Collision Sensing4) Driving Information5) Speedometer6) Compass7) Video Recording & Map Viewing8) Video Resolution Set Up9) Post-Collision Video Recording Time Set Up10) Audio Recording Set Up11) Video Recording Cycle Set Up12) Recording File Size Set Up13) Video Encoder Set Up14) Automatic Emergency Number Dialing at Collision15) Video Quality Set Up16) Snapshot- Video List 1) Viewing Normal Recordings2) Viewing Collision Recordings3) Video Recording Storage4) Deleting Video Recordings (Selective Delete, Delete All)5) Viewing Video Information 6) Viewing Video Recordings7) Sending Video Recordings (SMS, E-Mail, etc.)- Video Player 1) Supports various player views (video, map, video & Map)2) Shortcut to easy viewing3) Route Tracking4) Address Information5) Media Controller- GPS Camera1) GPS-Linked Picture-Taking2) Picture Gallary3) Viewing the picture-taken location on the map4) Flash Set Up5) Automatic Zoom Set Up6) Automatic Saving Set Up- Where is My Car?1) Registering My Car2) Edit & Delete from My Car List3) Search my car 4) Automatic notification in my car around - Settings 1) General settings 2) Sensor Settings 3) Record set 4) AutoBoy-information - Help1) Help provided by video.2) Can see an accident video.Autoboy will alway do it's best to protect you from vehicle accidents.Autoboy made it's market debut at version 0.9.1. It is still in beta stage, so there may still be some bugs. Please do not hesitate to contact the developer if you find bugs and performance issues. With your help, the developer will strive to provide only the best black box application. Please be sure to give your rating and review of Autoboy in the market place too.

reviews.title: Good but for only certain devices
reviews.comment: Better app than the rest of free competitors.Doesn\'t work for me because portrait mode can\'t be inverted so in my tablet car bracket the camera gets blocked. Please allow to be able to rotate the portrait mode 180 degrees. that addition will make the app more appealing to users of tablets of various brands and earn five stars.
reviews.author: Mauricio Mora

reviews.title: Background Issues
reviews.comment: HTC Droid Incredible 2  I downloaded this to use in case of an accident for insurance purposes. The only problem I\'m having is when I go to my texts or music, etc. and it records in the background, when I pull down my action bar to open it back up, it stops recording when I click it, then starts a new recording automatically when it opens. Other than that, it\'s a great and highly useful app.
reviews.author: Nathan Hohlt

reviews.comment: Could use simpler controls just a bit hard to set up for driving and control it. For free can\'t complain one bit . Not at all.But other than that it will work just fine. Thank u and good work to the uploader. Keep up the fine work.
reviews.author: Tony Tobias

reviews.title: brii app
reviews.comment: enjoyed using it . easy to use gives lots of info recording on my galaxy  both night and day iz good quality.  makes for intresting watching what other drivers do at times mind boggling
reviews.author: jonjoe john

reviews.title: Good but not the best
reviews.comment: It doesn\'t adjust the brightness of the video all the time.when change of position from dark to bright you cannot see anything at all. Fix this will be good.
reviews.author: Bhakavas Bhakkaman

reviews.title: It records video but so does my phone
reviews.comment: The map, compass, speedometer doesn\'t work, and I can\'t change the path for the photos to be saved. I do really like the field that allows me to save on my TRUE SD CARD which is sdcard/eternal_sd. For whatever reason Samsung Galaxy 2 saves everything on the phone even if it says saved to sdcard it saves files & apps to the device memory unless it says saved to sdcard then it saves everything on the partition USB Storage. I hope you get the bugs out soon. I know its very hard to make 1 app that works on all
reviews.author: Richard Rude

reviews.title: Autoboy
reviews.comment: Good job! Keep it up. Best app for carcam i have tested.
reviews.author: Victory Player

reviews.comment: Regular crashing. Video wobbles. About 1 in 6 videos for some reason refuse to play after recording.
reviews.author: Anthony Kenny

reviews.title: how do I turn this thing off?
reviews.comment: How do you get this thing to stop running?  I\'m finding that most of these dash cam apps are so buggy and battery draining that they are not worth it.  While l like this app, I can\'t for the life of me figure out how to get it stop recording and stop running in the background. Anybody else having this issue?
reviews.author: Gary Gold

reviews.title: Good, could be better.
reviews.comment: A major improvement would be that as the unit is constantly recording a 2 minute loop, upon collision or very hard braking, the last 2 minutes (or whatever interval is selected) is automatically stored to memory.  That way chip memory is not filled with unwanted/unneeded video.
reviews.author: Stephen Isakson

reviews.title: Exceptional!
reviews.comment: This app does all that the developer says it will, and it does so without any fuss or difficulty. One of the best apps I have ever encountered!
reviews.author: Thys Pretorius

reviews.title: Excellent free app
reviews.comment: Been using for months and it works perfect! Good quality video, easy to use, no annoying ads! Keep up the good work! :-)
reviews.author: Scott Stokes

reviews.title: Nifty app, could be very handy in an accident
reviews.comment: This really is a great app.  You can just record your trip for fun, but it can also be very useful in an accident to prove who was at fault, plus you can program it to dial an emergency number if it detects a severe collision.  Only complaint is that the Speedometer is only working in KM/h even though I select MPH, so the measly 300 million of us living in the U.S. can\'t use the speedometer.  Also wish you could select a digital speedometer option.  Would be MUCH easier to see, especially while driving, which translates to safety.
reviews.author: Eric Denney

reviews.comment: Very nice. The best i found
reviews.author: Tamir Cohen

reviews.title: Autoboy
reviews.comment: Excellent app. Works really well on my galaxy s3
reviews.author: Mark Gosling

reviews.title: Bad videos
reviews.comment: I\'ve got unusable videos. I\'ve lost lots of good videos I had deliberately saved. One star to compensate for the non savvy users who think it\'s anything more than a 3 star app.
reviews.author: Christian Lanctot

reviews.title: Great for free
reviews.comment: Adding a rotated landscape option to the msin menu screen would give it 5*
reviews.author: Grant Dow

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: very usefull i like this app
reviews.author: Gunata Putra

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: One drawback is it cannot save directly to external sd card when mounted (installed). I use AutoGuard for long recordings. I will buy the pro when it can save to external card.
reviews.author: Ben R

reviews.comment: Good app, but not working with sdcard on Samsung Galaxy Note
reviews.author: Alexander Kirkov
